names.english: clove and evodia decoction to regulate the middle
names.commonEnglish: Clove and Evodia Decoction to Regulate the Middle

actions: Warms the Spleen and Stomach and eliminates interior Cold.
With Gan Cao, for vomiting and epigastric pain due to Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.
With Bai Zhu, for diarrhea due to Spleen Deficiency.
Reinforces Yang, strongly tonifies Yuan Qi and harmonizes the Middle Jiao.
With Bai Zhu, tonifies the transformation and transportation functions of the Spleen.
Strengthens the Spleen and dries Dampness.
With Ren Shen, tonifies the Spleen and Stomach.
With Ren Shen and Gan Jiang, for Middle Jiao Deficiency Cold with abdominal pain, distention, vomiting and diarrhea.
Augments the Qi of the Middle Jiao and harmonizes.
Warms the Middle Jiao, relieves pain, descends Qi, warms the Kidneys and assists Yang.
With Bai Zhu, for Spleen Deficiency.
Warms the Middle Jiao, disperses Cold, promotes the movement of Qi, relieves Stagnation in the Liver channel, alleviates pain, spreads the Liver, descends rebellious Qi and stops vomiting.
With Gan Jiang, for acid reflux after meals due to Deficiency and Cold in the Stomach.

symptoms: All Blood from bleeding is pale
Hypochondriac pain that shoots toward the Heart
Rigid focal distention in the Heart region
Excessive production or drooling of foamy saliva
manifestations.pulse: Deep, weak and slow or Deep and thready or Big and weak

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with External Wind Invasion with fever.
Contraindicated for those with Yin Deficiency.
For those with sudden turmoil disorder, stop when diarrhea and vomiting have stopped.
